method.text: For the base, crush the biscuits, using a rolling pin, until mainly fine crumbs.
Melt the butter in a pan over a low heat. Stir in the biscuit crumbs until well combined.
Press the crumbs into the bottom of a loose-based 23 cm spring-clip cake tin.
In a large bowl, mix together the cream cheese, sugar, flour and vanilla extract. Beat with an electric hand mixer until light and fluffy.
Add eggs and egg yolks and beat on a low speed until just combined.
Stir in the whipping cream and lemon peel. Pour into the cake tin.
Bake for 1 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>1</sub> days until the centre appears to be nearly set when shaken.
Remove from the oven. Cool for 30 min. Remove the sides of the tin. Chill for 1-1 days.
Decorate with blueberries, raspberries and apple slices dipped in lemon juice.
